Solar & USB Charging Power: The outdoor solar light is powered by upgraded high-efficiency solar panel and usb charge port,6 hours to get fully charged for USB charging and 8 hours for solar charging. When fully charged, it provides up to 8 hours lighting per day.The extra USB charging port guarantees double battery life without worrying about continuous rainy days
Multiple Occasions & Easy to Hang:Vintage outdoor string lights give off a beautiful and bright but not overwhelming glow, creating a warm and romantic atmosphere to your space. Perfect for wedding, birthday party or other events use. There is a hook on the top of the socket, which is very easy to hang with a cable tie or ropes, saving you time
Shatterproof bulbs: The E26 led bulbs are made of quality plastic, much more shatterproof than glass bulb type.It also comes with some free hooks and ties which can prevent items from shaking or falling due to wind, rain or other uncontrollable factors,IP65 Waterproof solar string lights Work well on all weather. Perfect for brightening your garden, backyard, patio, balcony or any other place you want
100% Satisfaction Services: You can’t go wrong with Dott Arts String Lights. We offer a 12 months’ warranty from the date of purchase and friendly customer service for a lifetime. Product Description

EUCOS Solved the Problems of Bulky Volume, Rust and Fracture of the Traditional Tripod Stand, Brings the Best Phone Tripod with Strong Survivability.

EUCOS Multi-Role iPhone Tripod Stand with Remote On the Road as Travel Selfie Stick tripod for iPhone 13 Series, Galaxy Series, Pixel, etc

You can make full use of your lens language to shoot creative videos and photos.Let this portable tripod around with you from office to everywhere, from novice to professional. It’s Perfect for selfies, group photos, adventure travel, vlogging, YouTube videos, Tiktok videos, FaceTime, Instagram.Compatible with mobile smartphones from 2.2″-3.6″ in size wide.iPhone: iPhone 13/ 13 Pro/ 13 Pro Max/ 13 Mini/ iPhone SE(2022)/ iPhone 12/ 12 Pro/ 12 Pro Max/ 12 Mini/ 11/ 11 Pro/ 11 Pro Max/ 8 Plus/ 8/ X/ XS Max/ XS/ XR/ 7 Plus/ 7/ 6s/ SE,Galaxy Series: Galaxy S22 Ultra/ S22+/ S22/ S21 FE 5G/ S21 Ultra 5G/ S21+ 5G/ S21 5G/ S20 FE/ S20 Ultra/ S20+/ S20/S10+/ S10/ S10e/ S9+/ S9/ S8+/ S8/ S7 Edge/ Note 20/ Note 10/ Note 9/ Note 8,Pixel Phone: Pixel 6 Pro/ 6/ 5/5a/ 4/ 4XL/ 3/ 3XL/ 2/ 2XL/ XL

Preset Angle Rotation Phone Mount Adapter

Securely holds smartphone phone from 2.2″-3.6″ in size wide.Provides the iPhone with extremely easy adjustment of horizontal, 45 degree,or vertical position.The integrated Cold-Shoe expansion port can expand fill light and microphone equipment for vlogging.

Universal 1/4″ Screw

With the multi-functional rotating phone amount with universal 1 /4″ screws, that greatly expands the use range and purpose of the tripod, and can be safely connected to almost all smartphones and most action cameras, camera, ring light, etc.

Non-slip Texture

Eucos smart phone tripod stand is a cylinder after folded, Texture on the surface provide excellent hand feel and anti-slip, So this travel tripod stand with remote can be used as selfie stand.

Aluminum Ring Lock

Aluminum alloy material for excellent texture, The annular lock catch brings annular and balanced locking pressure, which will not damage the shape of the tall tripod telescopic rod and cause the loss of function

Cushion Foot Pad

Silicone pad, Provide perfect impact protection without damaging the wood floor, No falling off of small parts, Provide a safe environment for pets and children.

Tear Resistance Anti-Fracture

It can withstand all kinds of uncontrollable accidental damage during use, such as stepping on it and pets biting it.

SPECIFICATION

Work Mode: Phone Tripod Stand & Selfie StickMaterial: Aluminum+Nylon 6/6Carry Size: 11.6‘’Max Height: 62”Tripod Weight: 14ozRemote Control: 33ft

[Fast Extended Cell Phone tripod] Effortlessly extends, A precision-crafted extension rod extends smoothly and uniformly, With a simple “Pull” the tri pod iphone stand can be transformed into a long selfie stick, It glides to 62 inches tall tripod in less than a second.
[Extremely Scalable Phone Stand Tripod] The flexible, highly durable tripod for phone and camera mount adapter for a excellent clamping stability. The integrated Cold-Shoe expansion port can expand fill light and microphone equipment for Vlogging.
[Easy Framing] It’s limit flange design provides the iPhone tripod stand with extremely easy adjustment of horizontal, 45 degree or vertical position, Can securely holds smartphones from 2.2″-3.6″ in size wide.
[Remote Shooting & Free creation] Whether you take a group selfie, apply iPhone stand for video recording capture stable video, all under the tripod with remote control. Cooperate with the adapter mount that lets you gain unique vantage point and angles when filming, Get a new perspective.
[Multi-Role & Wide Compatibility] EUCOS 2 in 1 multifunctional portable tripod for iPhone can be used as both a selfie stick tripod. Mounted on the top of the cell phone tripod stand with universal 1/4″ screws that can be connected to most cameras, action cameras, and GoPro.
[Aftersales Service] Eucos phone tripod with remote provides worry-free 24 months replacement service and lifetime friendly after-sales service. 100 percent customer satisfaction is the pursuit of Eucos iphone stand tripod.Any product defects and customer dissatisfaction,We promise to return a full refund of purchase price.

BSGlobal LED Lights

Large Cover Size Net Lights


Solar Powered LED Christmas String Lights Outdoor Indoor Decoration

  • Christmas Wide Angle LED String Lights – Light Up Your Life

5MM led string lights surface is wide angle concave lens, with multi-angle light source, more dispersed and clear than other shapes of light, radiating a halo of light in all directions, shining but not too dazzling.

  • Extra Long Christmas String Lights

100Ft extra long outdoor wide angle string lights with 300 high quality LED, mini beads sealed against moisture, eliminate corrosion. Maximize the durability and practicality of the string lights.

  • Energy Efficient

High-quality solar panels can store a lot of electricity, and the high-bright LED light saves more energy than traditional decorative light sections, with a bulb life of up to 5,000 hours.

Auto ON/OFF Solar Lights String

  • Higher Solar Conversion
  • 6-8 hours auto charge during the day
  • Longer Working Time
  1. Auto light up for 8-12 hours when motion is detected at night
  2. Ensure that the solar panels are directly exposed to sunlight to complete the conversion of light energy into electricity.
  • Note:
  1. Please turn on the lights when charging and the light will not be on when the solar panel is absorbing solar energy.L
  2. ight sensor control, it only lights in certain dim environments or darker. But it will light as the panel covered even in daytime.

Read more

Commercial Grade 5MM Christmas Lights with Multi-function Remote Control

  • 8 Lighting Modes

Combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on. 8 different light modes to create different styles of atmosphere and enjoy a unique light show.

  • Timer Function & Memory Function

Auto charge during the day and light up at night, 24 hours cycle. And with memory function, retain the mode before shutdown, no need to repeat the settings, saving your time and energy.

  • Durable Green Wire

Thicker and more robust than traditional lights wire. Can withstand the wear and tear of indoor or outdoor use.

  • Widely Use – Decorate Your Life

Perfect for Christmas, party, garden, Valentine’s Day, wedding, home, window, bathroom, festival, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building, shopping center etc.

Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

Specifications:

Power Output: 14V

Power Consumption: 10.5W

Waterproof Grade: IP65

Power Input: 100-240V, 50/60HZ

Projection Distance: 3-7m / 8.94-22.96ft

Use Scene: Indoor/Outdoor

16 Slides Patterns Mode & 10 Colors Water Wave Mode Create Various Effects for Holiday

16 Holiday Slides Patterns: 5 for Christmas 3 for Halloween 1 for Thanksgiving 1 for Birthday 6 for Celebration

Package Includes:

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

1 * Ground Stake

1 * User Manual

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.

From the brand

【Remote Control & 4 Lighting Modes】The solar outdoor lights is equipped with a wireless remote control, allowing you to select the most appropriate mode more conveniently. No longer need to take it off and set it like other solar light(you need to manually press the switch for the first time). The solar panel and spotlights can be rotated to any angle you desire.
【4 Adjustable Heads & Solar Panel】4-head adjustable design, which can move up, down and horizontally. The solar panel can be adjusted at will to ensure that each angle can absorb sunlight to the maximum extent. The illumination angle of up to 270 ° and the sensing distance of 26 feet can provide additional brightness and a larger visible area.
【All weather】This solar lamp is made of durable materials to ensure that outdoor lamps can work normally even in heavy rain and snowstorm. IP65 is waterproof and designed to withstand extreme weather conditions.
【Easy to install, long working time】Easy to install without annoying wires or adapters, Only using the included screws to fix on any exterior wall constructed of all types.The built-in 1800mAh high-efficiency solar cell, so please install these lights in the sun to charge the battery.

There are so many choice, you would find one you like.Suitable for children’s rooms, bedrooms, creating a ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:32:18 UTC – Details)



1【16 Color Sunset Light & 4 Flashing Modes】The sunset lamp projector build-in RGB led, 16 kinds of light effect and 4 dynamic modes(Flash/Strobe/Fade/Smooth Effect) to choose from, provides a comfortable and romantic atmosphere. There are so many choice, you would find one you like.Suitable for children’s rooms, bedrooms, creating a different sunset projector light atmosphere, let you enjoy your leisure time and your family.
2【Smart APP and Remote Control Sunset Lamp】This is a smart sunlight lamp, you can change color of light, adjust brightness of lamp, choose light mode of this sunset lamp projector to make it become a party light or night light through APP on the phone or the remote control; Super convenient and versatile!
3【Portable size Rotatable and Adjustable】The lamp tripod can be rotated and adjusted.The Sunset Lamp head can be rotated 360 degrees, By changing the rotation angle and distance of the illuminator, different circular lights can be emitted from different angles, thereby bringing different effects. The farther the distance is, the larger the projection projected on the wall or ceiling.
4【Widely USE】It is very suitable for use as a background for photos, live broadcast and Vlog video shooting, as well as decoration for bedrooms, living rooms, corridors, cafes, studios, theme restaurants, bars, etc. At the same time, it is also very suitable for occasions such as dating, marriage proposal, parties, birthdays, family celebrations, garden parties and so on.
5 【365 DayQuality Assurance】If you are not 100% satisfied with sunset lights, just contact us and we will refund or replace your product immediately. If you have any questions about our sunlamp, please contact us first, and our support team will try to help you solve all problems…

【Amazing Maximum Height to 67in】With a minimum storage space to 20in, easy to carry when traveling, hiking or camping. Fully Extendable to 67in, allowing you to take photos of the whole family and capture the best moments.
【Selfie Stick Tripod & Phone Tripod Stand】Switch freely between selfie stick mode and tripod stand mode. The tripod is applicable to any situation such as video shooting, group photos, vlogging, adventuring, and taking selfies. Plus, it works in landscape or portrait mode.
【Strong and Sturdy】Made of highly-durable aluminum-alloy material with stainless steel, ABS plastic, designed with base locking knob in the center to prevent tilting or wobbling. The most frequent issues occur at other selfie stick tripods are solved by our 67” tripod.
【Everything you Need in One Box】Supplied with both a phone holder for mobile phones and BC parts for Go pro as well as a Wireless Remote for long-distance control, this is the complete solution for the Content Creator. A do-everything, go-anywhere kit that’s been put together for today’s influencer and content creator: Youtuber, Instagrammer, Tiktoker, etc.
【Wide Compatibility】Universal phone Holder fits most smartphones with or without a case, compatible with Galaxy S9/S9 Plus/Note 8/S8/S8 Plus/S7 Edge/J7, Samsung, Huawei. With a universal 1/4 inch screw, it fits for the DSLR, SLR, action camera, webcam, camcorder.
【Perfect After-sale Service】UBeesize provides 24-month replacement service and lifetime friendly after-sales service. Any questions, feel free to contact our customer service staff.

4.5
Price: $24.30 - $13.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:31:23 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $209.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)



Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no video format restrictions, supports resolution 4K 60HZ (3860*2140P) input and output, Dolby DTS and other audio output.
Unmatched Color Accuracy: The D1 PRO uses an FPGA-based controller board and applies it to a light bar with ARGB LEDs, each light strip contains 60 ARGB LED beads per meter, ensuring it delivers vivid color reproduction every time. Through advanced AI programming, each LED light bead is intelligently controlled to provide stable, accurate, vivid and zero-lag color effects, which will provide extra light to the room while reducing eye strain when viewing in low light conditions pressure.
Personalization: D1 PRO has 15 light modes to immerse you in a visual wonderland and explore the infinite possibilities of lighting. It also comes with an easy-to-use remote, so you can change the color or brightness of the light whenever you want, depending on your mood or need, providing exciting lighting effects for music, videos and games.
Friendly Design and Easy to Use: We offer different sizes to match any screen from 32 inches to 120 inches, please buy as you need. At the same time, our LED light bar has a protective layer, which can be cut to the length you need along the dotted line according to your personal needs. All you need to do is plug the cable into the HDMI signal box and attach the strip to the back of the TV/Monitor screen to use (we come with the part to attach the LED strip).

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine’s Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

—Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

—8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

— 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

—Timer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

—Memory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

—Safe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

—IP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Material:Copper + Plastic

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Color: 5600K Warm White

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual
【Warm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control】Including (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. 【IP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS】Perfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
【4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function】Our Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
【Safety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape】UL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
【What You Get & Quality Assurance】1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don’t hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

From the brand

KERNOWO LED LIGHTS

All lights what you need

KERNOWO is a professional brand company focusing on home indoor lighting and outdoor lighting.

We are committed to providing customers with high-quality products that are convenient and energy-saving.

You will find many types LED lights you want.

Solar Lights with Remote

106 Solar Lights Outdoor with Independent Solar Panel 2 Pack

Solar Lights Outdoor

Super bright outside solar flood light, perfect for your outdoor use.

KERNOWO led lights

【Four Modes Adjustable】Four adjustable modes by pressing the button on the back of the solar outdoor light and the remote. Mode 1: Auto on at night, and motion sensor off. Mode 2: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and low light after people leave. Mode 3: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and turn off after people leave. Mode 4: Light fashes at night.
【Flexible Use】The solar panel of the solar led lights can be placed independently of the light body, and connected by a 16.5 ft wire to ensure maximum charging. Aslo you can put them together.
【Super Bright Light Beads】Equiped with 106 LED high light beads and an illumination of 180° wide, the solar lights outdoor can provide 500sq.ft and 3000LM lighting. 3000mAh lithium battery has a larger capacity to provide more efficient charging and more lasting lighting.
【Weatherproof & Durable】Built with IP65 Waterproof,the solar panel lights outdoor body is sturdy enough and the wire connection is sealed.It still works well in rainy and cold days and hot summer.
